comments.text:
+حسن الفريجي أنتِ الحب ولا أريد غيركِ عشقاً
أنتِ القلب ولا أريد غيركِ نبضاً
أنتِ الروح ولا أريد غيركِ أبداً
فأحتضنيني ليلاً ونــــــــهاراً
وأسكبيني عطراً صباحاً ومساءاً
وأحتويتي بقلبكِ عمراً وأيامــاً
وأبقي يدي في يدكِ دفئاً وحناناً
فلا أريد غيركِ مسكناً وعنــواناً

captions.text:
Flawed, 76% probability
of missing the target.

And this...is not an acceptable
way to arrive at training.

Even the greatest players of our
time make mistakes.

I give you
the future of football.

football was a wild and
unpredictable affair.

What do you think
happened to the Originals?

You mean, what are they doing
and where are they now?
I am Zlat...look, I am Zlatan!
Let me guess, same as last week?

Are you sure you
don't want a perm?

I like what you have
done with the place.
The game that we love is dying.
The Clones, they are killing it!
Sorry, let me just post this.

We all want to destroy the
clones, but they're unbeatable!

Nobody thinks
they can be beaten.
But you, you can do it!

I'm up for it.
Go, Timmy!
I mean all of you, together!

You are not
afraid to take risks!
You play like it's just a game;
they play like it's a job!

There's no greater danger,
than playing it safe.

It's official, the Originals are
back and they are challenging

the Clones to a sudden death,
winner take all game!

If they lose, they say they will
quit the game forever.

The question is, how will they
beat the perfect Clones?

...it's the biggest
match on the planet...

There's no greater danger,
than playing it safe.

title: Nike Football: The Last Game ft. Ronaldo, Neymar Jr., Rooney, Zlatan, Iniesta & more
